title: Beats Powerbeats Pro true wireless headphones are $50 off at Amazon today
text:
Only the best deals on Verge-approved gadgets get the Good Deals stamp of approval, so if you're looking for a deal on your next gadget or gift from major retailers like Amazon, Walmart, Best Buy, Target, and more, this is the place to be. For more information, see our ethics policy .

Amazon has marked down the Beats Powerbeats Pro true wireless headphones by $50 today. At $199.95, it matches the best price we’ve seen so far for this model, which ranks as our top choice if you’re looking for a set of wireless earphones.

The Powerbeats Pro work especially well with Apple products, as they use the H1 wireless chip for hands-free “Hey Siri” functionality, they can switch between paired Apple devices, and they charge via Lightning, like all current iPhones. Additionally, The Verge’s Chris Welch picked them over other competitors, like the latest Apple AirPods and Jabra’s 65t, because of their superior fit, comfort, battery life, and more.

What makes this deal even better than others that we’ve seen is that Amazon is including all four colors in the sale, and no offer code is required.
description: If you need a new set of truly wireless headphones, Beats Powerbeats Pro are $50 off at Amazon. This matches the best deal that we’ve seen, though it’s even better than others because it lets you pick between the four available colors.
